title: 431: Bekah’s Best First Date is BACK!
itunes:title: 431: Bekah’s Best First Date is BACK!
description:
Bekah’s best first date, Erik, is back on the podcast to catch up and chat some relationship advice! They talk about what it means when an ex says he’s “not what you need right now”, arguing in relationships, kissing techniques, being attracted to the wrong type of people, and much more! 

 

ERIK BRAGG:

Follow Erik on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/thisguysthelimit/ 

Follow his Air BnB here: https://www.instagram.com/risingsun.pioneertown/
